sentences.en: A prison sentence should match the severity of the crime.
sentences.cn: 刑期长短要和罪行轻重一致。

sentences.en: Also, the severity of the impact of each of these challenges on software platforms may vary from one organization to another.
sentences.cn: 另外，根据组织的不同，这里每一项挑战对于软件平台影响的严重性可能有所差异。

sentences.en: Believers were treated with the same severity as the Christians had been a few years earlier.
sentences.cn: 和几年前的基督徒一样，信徒们受到了同样严厉的对待。

sentences.en: His severity scared the children away.
sentences.cn: 他的严厉吓跑了孩子们.

sentences.en: In him the polarities of life are resolved and balanced: male and female, strength and compassion, severity and mercy.
sentences.cn: 在他身上，生命的两面性达到了调和与平衡：阳刚和阴柔、强悍和怜悯，还有严厉和仁慈。

sentences.en: Like most cases of extreme weather, its severity was due to an unusual confluence of events.
sentences.cn: 如同大多数极端天气状况一样，其剧烈程度是由于几种气象条件反常地汇集在一起造成的。

sentences.en: Several drugs are used to lessen the severity of the symptoms.
sentences.cn: 使用了几种药来减轻症状。

sentences.en: She wagged her finger with mock severity.
sentences.cn: 她故作严厉地摆了摆手指.

sentences.en: The average speed of the vehicles correlates closely with the severity of the accident caused.
sentences.cn: 平均车速与所引起事故的严重程度密切相关.

sentences.en: The Bishop said he was sickened by the severity of the sentence.
sentences.cn: 主教说他对如此重的量刑大为震惊。

sentences.en: The chances of a full recovery will depend on the severity of her injuries.
sentences.cn: 能否彻底康复取决于她受伤的严重程度。

sentences.en: The disease ranges widely in severity.
sentences.cn: 这种病的严重程度可以很不同.

sentences.en: The drug can reduce the frequency and severity of attacks.
sentences.cn: 这种药能降低发病次数和严重程度.

sentences.en: The new drug lessens the severity of pneumonia episodes.
sentences.cn: 新药减轻了肺炎发作时的痛苦。

sentences.en: The risk and severity of sunburn depend on the body's natural skin colour.
sentences.cn: 晒伤的风险和严重程度取决于人体的自然肤色。

sentences.en: The severity of the decree seemed deadly to Tess.
sentences.cn: 这种命令里的严厉意味,叫苔丝听来,真是万箭钻心.

sentences.en: the severity of the problem
sentences.cn: 问题的严重性

sentences.en: This does not prevent disease altogether, but can reduce its severity.
sentences.cn: 这虽然不能完全防止疾病，但能减少它的严重性。

sentences.en: When women started working in offices, they opted for severity in dress in order to imply sobriety.
sentences.cn: 女性开始在办公室上班后，就会选择朴素而简洁的着装，以看上去持重冷静。

sentences.en: With all the outward severity he is kind at heart.
sentences.cn: 他虽然外表严厉,但心地和善.

sentences.en: Within this dialog, you can change the severity rating of the selected rule, along with any other parameters that it defines.
sentences.cn: 在这个对话框内部，您能够改变被选中规则的严重性等级，以及其他任何参数。
